name: patroness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who supports an activity or organization, especially by giving money: A portrait of the museum's patroness hangs in the museum's library building. She started out in the world of opera as a patroness.
a woman, especially a Christian saint, who is believed to give special help to a particular place, activity, person, or type of object: St Cecilia is the patroness of Church music. She is seen as a patroness of feminists everywhere.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is grateful for the benevolence of his patroness.The Duchess du Berry was both patroness and student of Bessa's. The basilica honours the Virgin of Guadalupe, Mexico's patroness.
